DESCRIPTION: Increased breast size. Increases chance of receiving a random status card at end of turn.
Bras provide passive bonuses as long as your #yBuxom is within this range (inclusive). If your #yBuxom exceeds this range, they will break and create a status card.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Gain 1 #yBuxom every turn. Gives #yEnergy and draws cards when evoked.
Deals damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn. Damages all enemies when evoked.
Gain block at the start of your turn. Gain more block when evoked.
